adjective.description: Relating to or characterized by the belief that the Second Coming of Christ will precede the millennium.

noun.description: A person who believes that the Second Coming of Christ will precede the millennium.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in George Faber (1773–1854), Church of England clergyman and religious writer. From pre- + millenarian. With use as adjective compare earlier premillennial, postmillenarian, premillennian. With use as noun compare later premillennialist, postmillenarian.
